page.title: 16People in Durris
page.content: Although there is no town or village here,a lot of people live in our block.Most of them are quite friendly. Mainly Scots live here,but in the last few years, many newcomers have arrived.They have come because of the oil industry.We now have Dutch,German, Canadian,American,French and Filipino families here as well as extra Scots, English,Irish and Welsh people.Many of the foreign families live in Woodlands Park estate.Some have become part of the community,while others keep to themselves.There are a lot of younger people,some with small children.There are not very many old people.Many of the mothers stay at home during the day.There are really two groups of people living here now.First there are the older folk who have lived here for many years.Second,there are the younger people from other places.
